sense.def:
The length of something
je mera nečesa od enega konca do drugega.

seg.quote: It grows to a length of three or four metres.
The snake was a metre and a half in length.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi ali obstaja
along the length of something
, se zgodi ali obstaja vso pot vzdolž nečesa.

seg.quote: They travelled the length of the island.

sense.def:
To swim a length
pomeni plavati v plavalnem bazenu od enega konca do drugega.

A length of wood, string, cloth, or other material
je kos lesa, vrvice ali kakšne druge snovi.

The length of an event, activity, or situation
je čas, kolikor traja neki dogodek, dejavnost ali položaj.

seg.quote: The length of the visit depends on you.
It is foolish to expect to be happy for any length of time.

sense.def:
The length of something
je tudi lastnost nečesa, da je dolgo.

seg.quote: I hope the length of this letter will make up for my not having written earlier.
There was another silence. At length Claire said, ‘You mean you're not going?’
He spoke at some length about the press.

sense.def:
To go to great lengths to achieve something
pomeni močno se potruditi in morda iti v skrajnosti, da bi nekaj dosegli.
